message.body: The procedure hasn't started yet. Still waiting. Hope the funeral goes well
I'm thinking of you and dad. Be at church at 1030 right?
Right! Or if you were me a little before : , love you
Dad will need surgery. We'll meet with a surgeon this afternoon and be home tonight. Would you call nan a and papa and my mom? Tell them what i told you and that i'll call them later
Ok, I will. When is the surgery?
We won't know until after we meet the surgeon. How was the funeral?
It was fine, Gary was nervous. What kind or surgery?
